This is one of the few games that I have played that I would consider a greatest of all time games. Valve has such a great team there it's usually very hard to mess up a game. This is no exception. The story is absolutely thrilling and is supplemented by the great puzzled place to move the story forward. Many easter eggs and little details that creates an unforgettable experience. It also adds lore to the full portal/half-life universe. Perfectly challenging and engaging. Fantastic game.

Данной игре уже довольно много лет, но она очень красивая. Запускается на даже очень слабом компьютере. Потраченных денег стоит. И +стоит довольно дешево. Мне хватило на 1,5 деней прохождения. Еще после прохождения есть бонус в виде  
прохождения игры за роботов Пибоди и Атлас, в этот режи надо играть с другом, а если друзей нет,то можно играть с рандомными людьми и заводить знакомства
经典之作，就是感觉自己有点笨，经常卡关

This review is from an idiot who spent 13 hours in the span of 2 or more years trying to finish it. At first i was really bored and would play only if i didnt have anything to do, as the puzzles were too simple, but as the game progressed on i began to see that i would struggle at nearly every level, and even tho i would get stuck at every level for a trillion years i would still be able to solve it without the help of youtube(except for one time). The story was quite unique, from my point of view and the ending was the best.

In conclusion i really recommend this game for anyone who was like 10 hours on their hands and wants some fun and exciting puzzles
